scripts.build: npm run basecoat && npm run alpine && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/styles.css -o ./assets/styles.css --minify && npx @11ty/eleventy
scripts.dev: npm run basecoat && npm run alpine &&  concurrently "npx @11ty/eleventy --serve" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/styles.css -o ./assets/styles.css --watch"
